entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
